Dear Clients,
 
BARBUSS ACQUIRES BROWNE,
ADDING A CENTURY OF EXPERTISE
 
BARBUSS, with over 20 years of experience, continues its expansion, reaffirming its commitment to transform the risk industry.
 
Buenos Aires, Argentina – April 2025 – BARBUSS, a global company providing Specialty Insurance management, Claims Management and Tailored Financing solutions to the risk industry, today announces the acquisition of Browne, a firm with over a century of experience in marine and transportation loss adjusting.

Founded in 1919, Browne has been a recognized leader in its industry, offering expertise and prestige in the management of marine and transportation claims. Throughout its history, it has built long-standing relationships with both domestic and international insurers, obtaining important designations, such as that of exclusive correspondent for the American Institute of Marine Underwriters (AIMU) and representations of leading entities like TMN Survey Group, Tokio Marine, and the Shanghai Institute for Marine Insurance.

BARBUSS is currently working on an integration process to ensure a seamless transition, with the objective of combining the best of both companies to offer even more comprehensive and efficient solutions.

BARBUSS is currently working on an integration process to ensure a seamless transition, with the objective of combining the best of both companies to offer even more comprehensive and efficient solutions.

Thank you for your trust in BARBUSS. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact the Key Contacts.

Sincerely,
BARBUSS
